snippet.title: Zafe's Adventures - SAGE '22 Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
This is my first time to making a platformer games using one of my game engine. I just hoped people will going to enjoy this game. But the bad news is, this game has only 2 levels and it's quite short. But I thought that... it's okay about this game. I made this debut piece for SAGE '22 when the event is out. So for this preview trailer, sorry about my video quality and its bugs. But it is fine if you are still expect it. This game would likely be a weak pest now, but I hope I will going to improve my game design skill somedays. And full game will be finished and ready to be released soon. And by the way, I'm sorry about being inactive for 4 months, I feel like I was being lazy all the time.

Check it out here:
https://sonicfangameshq.com/forums/showcase/zafes-adventures.1481/

Demo will be releasing later on itch.io and Game Jolt, so stay tuned for more update!

Music: Walking under Spring Rain by Denis Davidov
Obtained from The Mod Archive

TuanBaoDoratom / TuanBao Games
2022
